name: Lex's Path
description: It’s time to go trick or treating! Help a little witch fly across the night sky from house to house in her quest for candy in Lex’s Path! Drag and drop broomsticks into a path for Lex to fly on! But be careful of the black cats littered across the sky, after all, a witch never wants to hurt her friends! Solve all 15 levels in this cute pastel halloween game! With an increasing level difficulty level difficulty and plenty of ways to solve each puzzle, Lex’s Path will provide a challenging and fun overall experience.
